import { Component } from "react" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faUser,faFile,faPencilAlt,faCamera,faAngleRight} from '@fortawesome/fontawesome-free-solid' class Cv extends Component{ componentDidMount(){ let name = `${JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("Personal Data")).firstName } ${JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("Personal Data")).lastName }`; let nameSection = document.getElementById("cv-name").innerHTML=name let image = `${JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("Personal Data")).img }` let imagep =document.getElementById("cv-image-template") let pname =document.getElementById("personal-name") pname.innerHTML =name imagep.setAttribute("src", image); } render(){ return(
